name: Zone Six
overview: A multi-genre platformer\shooter. You must defend your city from a massive enemy attack. Headquarters assigns you multiple defense zones, but your main purpose is to reach zone six to defuse and enemy-placed bomb that can destroy the entire city. To win you will have to fight night and day to drive all kinds of vehicles to be able to face tanks, helicopters, planes, ships, fighters and deadly missiles. In this vital mission you will have to show all your skill in defending yourself from enemy attackers who will try to hit you from the ground and chase you into the sky.
